about_the_game:
View all of the action in Larcenauts, the top VR hero shooter, in full screen and full resolution on your PC monitor. Perfect for viewing Larcenauts competitions or getting the highest quality video for streaming.

Easy to use interface get's you right in the action so that you can see everything going on in a Larcenauts match.

Features Include:
✦ Full screen, full resolution, spectator view

✦ Easily find friends in Larcenauts and spectate their games

✦ Use the Spectator code to watch private competition games.

✦ Spectate from multiple camera locations in the map or use the follow camera to follow specific players

Want to get in on the action? Add Larcenauts to your game library and join the competition.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i5-4590 / AMD Ryzen 5 1500X or greater
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 970 / AMD Radeon R9 290 or greater
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 18 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i5-4590 / AMD Ryzen 5 1500X or greater
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1060 / AMD Radeon RX 480 or greater
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 18 GB available space

short_description: View Larcenauts games full screen and in full resolution for the best flat screen viewing and streaming experience. Use the friends list and spectator codes to easily join and spectate games. Never miss the action with multiple camera views and a follow cam to follow players.
supported_languages:
English*, French, German, Spanish - Spain, Japanese, Korean, Simplified Chinese
*languages with full audio support
